<Script Language="JavaScript">
function Discuss(strUrl)
{
    var L_IE5upRequired_Text = "'Discuss' requires a Windows SharePoint Services-compatible application and Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 or greater.";
    if (browseris.ie5up && browseris.win32)
	window.parent.location.href = strUrl;
    else
	alert(L_IE5upRequired_Text);
}

Case.HTML: Use this page to approve or reject submissions. Note that rejecting an item does not delete it, and that users who know the exact URL of a rejected item can still view it.
Approve, reject, or leave the status as Pending for others with the Manage Lists right to evaluate the item.
This item will become visible to all users.
This item will be returned to its creator and not appear in public views.
This item will remain visible to its creator and all users with the Manage Lists right.
Use this field to enter any comments about why the item was approved or rejected.

Default.HTML: Items on this list require content approval. Your submission will not appear in public views until approved by someone with proper rights.

ListFormClosing.HTML:
<SCRIPT>
function OnLoadWrapper()
{
    try
    {
        if (null != document.all.onetidApproved)
            frm.InitFormFields();
        else
            frm.SetFirstFocus();
    }
    catch(e)
    {
    }
}
if ((browseris.ie4up) && !browseris.mac) 
{
    document.body.onload = OnLoadWrapper;
}
else 
{
    frm.SetFirstFocus();
}
</SCRIPT>
